sentence.Network_en: In fact, however, there is no talismanic significance to the word " proposal ".
sentence.Network_cn: 然而, 事实上, “ 提案 ” 一词本身并不具备护身符般的特殊意义.

sentence.Network_en: Toure, Arsenal's talismanic Ivory Coast defender, is missing through suspension for this match.

a talismanic amulet ., 一个有魔力的护身符.
